other_tests.findings: Larger than 12-mm vegetation on the mitral valve with moderate mitral regurgitation.
Mold morphologically identified as Scopulariopsis species.
Excision of the infected mitral valve pericardial prosthesis and associated fungal vegetation.
Blood oozing around the esophageal prosthesis; identification of a major bleeding source from RESCA.
Ostial RESCA ligature and construction of a bypass between the ascending aorta and the axillary artery.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Lesions finally healed after initial bleeding control procedures.
